Cek Tagihan Listrik PLN via Online, Begini Caranya
01 Nov 2019, 12:36 by Puti Yasmin


Cek Tagihan Listrik PLN via Online, Begini Caranya/Foto: Rengga Sancaya

Jakarta - Tagihan listrik harus dibayarkan setiap bulannya. Kini, ada cara mudah cek tagihan listrik PLN melalui online. Bagaimana caranya?Cek tagihan listrik tak perlu menggunakan laptop atau komputer karena bisa dilakukan hanya lewat HP. Mudah kan?Berikut cara cek tagihan listrik lewat HP seperti yang dirangkum detikcom:1. WebsiteLangkah pertama cek tagihan listrik PLN dengan membuka website di alamat www.pln.co.id. Kemudian, pada bagian kiri pilih menu dan klik Pelanggan dan pilih layanan online.Pada layanan online tersebut, pengguna diminta memilih kembali pada bagian bawah 'Informasi Tagihan dan Token Listrik'. Lalu, pengguna akan diminta login dengan mengisi email dan kata sandi.Setelah data lengkap, pengguna akan mendapatkan jumlah tagihan listrik PLN yang harus dibayarkan. 2. AplikasiSelain melalui website, cek tagihan listrik online juga bisa melalui aplikasi. Caranya dengan download aplikasi PLN Mobile. Kemudian, login dengan memasukan kata sandi.Bila pengguna belum terdaftar, cukup isi nama lengkap, nomor meter, lokasi, nomor HP, alamat email, dan kata sandi.Setelah mengisi lengkap data untuk login, pengguna akan mendapatkan informasi tagihan listrik.Nah, selamat cek tagihan listrik dengan mudah ya! Check PLN Electricity Bill via Online, Here's How
Nov 01 2019, 12:36 p.m. by Puti Yasmin


Check PLN Electricity Bill via Online, Here's How / Photo: Rengga Sancaya

Jakarta - Electricity bills must be paid every month. Now, there is an easy way to check PLN electricity bills through online. How to do it? Check the electricity bill, no need to use a laptop or computer because it can be done only through a cellphone. Easy, right? Here's how to check the electricity bill via cellphone as summarized by AFP: 1. Website The first step is to check the PLN electricity bill by opening the website at www.pln.co.id. Then, on the left select the menu and click on Customers and select an online service. At the online service, the user is asked to re-select at the bottom of the 'Electricity Bill and Token Information'. Then, the user will be asked to log in by filling in their email and password. After the data is complete, the user will get the amount of the PLN electricity bill that must be paid. 2. ApplicationIn addition to the website, online electricity bill checks can also be through the application. You do this by downloading the PLN Mobile application. Then, log in by entering the password. If the user has not registered, just fill in your full name, meter number, location, cellphone number, email address, and password. After filling in the complete data for login, the user will get electricity bill information. Well, congratulations check your electricity bill easily!
